Text: Jet Li,my favorite KUNG FU star,is the real martial artist!

works, full 5.1 dolby digital and appears to be full 1080p (not that familiar w/ the powerdvd software yet).  i couldnt get it to work on media player classic, vlc, or wmp11.  only powerdvd (deluxe) worked (there is a torrent for that floating around...).

ill keep seeding for a while once the powerdvd patch finishes downloading (torrent wasnt up to date, but i downloaded it a while ago).
